So, we recommend you apply early! The location for this position is for our Dunsmuir Downtown Vancouver office in BC. We are looking for a motivated and talented Co-op to join our dynamic team. You will prepare electrical load and sales analysis, reports, energy uses using modelling tools, techniques and methods; respond to enquiries regarding customer and energy data analysis. Key Duties and Responsibilities: 1. Prepares a variety of electrical load and sales reports, scenarios and variance analysis used for load management, sales forecasting and transmission and distribution planning by: determining sources, researching and examining data relating to energy use and to factors affecting future energy requirements; obtaining economic and statistical data to calculate load forecasts in conjunction with researched data; calibrate end use model parameters to market results and run model; prepare statistical tables and narrative reports. 2. Develops new and/or revised customer and energy insights methodologies by: researching and documenting methodologies and techniques used by other utilities; assessing value and determining applicability to BC Hydro's system; preparing statistical and narrative reports summarizing findings; implementing new methodology into system; developing related files, records and computer programs. 3. Conducts energy modelling using established models by: determining sources, researching, obtaining and examining economic, statistical and sales data relating to energy use and the factors affecting future energy requirements; calibrating model parameters to market results; analyzing model output and assessing results; 4. Responds to a variety of enquiries related to customer and energy load analysis , energy usage and estimates; researches, compiles, evaluates and prepares information and packages. 5. Provides technical support in the analysis of customer load profiles; prepares information packages related to customer load profiles; explains model output as required.
